name: Boulder Trouble
description:
( Work in progress some features are not available yet ) 

This is a simple puzzle game. In which you have to push the boulders to build your way to the flag. There are 9 Levels in this game.

Instructions:

left - move left

right - move right

x/space - jump

z - grab

r - reset level

Credits:

Game made by - Danman980

Please also give me your valuable feedback.
